entry.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: aRonnieAlsop/parks_and_rec_backend: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.
entry.content: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.
